thread.title: Costco Members! You May Soon Be Able To Have Groceries Delivered To Your Door
thread.title_full: Costco Members! You May Soon Be Able To Have Groceries Delivered To Your Door

author: Hannah (Sensational Sidekick)
title: Costco Members! You May Soon Be Able To Have Groceries Delivered To Your Door
text:
Have you ever used a grocery delivery service? Starting March 21st , Costco is teaming up with Shipt , an online grocery delivery company, to deliver groceries to the homes of Costco members in the Tampa metro area. Shipt plans to expand to 50 additional markets and over 30 million households by the end of the year. Head HERE for more details.
Note that a Shipt Membership is priced at $99 per year or $14 per month , plus there is a delivery fee of $7 for orders under $35 (the delivery fee is waived for orders of $35 or more). However, Tampa residents will be able to try out Shipt for two weeks FREE plus save $15 off their first order when the new Costco program launches.

Will you use this service when it comes to your area?
